summary: High resoluted and high detailed retextures for a lot of furniture and clutter.
descriptionHtml:
Here are some retextures for often used textures in the game which were pretty low detailed. I tried to create high detailed retextures while staying as close as possible to the original. 
Here a list of the retextures:

- A lot of wooden furniture (normal and noble)
- the archerytarget
- the wooden chest (including a snow-edition)

Doesn\'t sound too much, but you\'d be surprised how many textures are replaced ingame.
I hope you enjoy this.

Installation:
Copy the files to your [...]SteamApps/common/skyrim/data folder - done

MISSING TEXTURES:
- The noble bed... an awful lot of work, coming soon.

[URL=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2632&tab=3&navtag=/modules/comments/comments_ajax.php?tid=486136|:|fid=2632] My HD Bar-Retexture[/URL]
author: Flumsy
